about_the_game:
Sam Vs (a lot of) Djs is a rhythm game involving combat mechanics, transforming each punch and each dodge into a flawless choreography. Immerse yourselves in the fast-paced and complex rhythms of electronic music.

Play as Sam, a normal young woman with an above average sense for music, and help her defeat the djs who stole her usb keys, stealing her merit for the title of Best DJ of Acid City.

Featuring tracks from some of the best electronic music producers from France's new golden generation, expect a journey through deep basslines, heavy kicks and hypnotic acid melodies.

Note from the developper : This prototype is still under heavy development and will be updated regularly throughout 2025 (and 2026 ?). Come back from time to time to witness this simple concept becoming a deep and rich musical, visual and mechanical experience.

name: Sam Vs (a lot of) DJs - Public Prototype Version

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: ntel Core i5–12400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: When rhythm is mastered, combat becomes a choreography. Be one with the music and help Sam defeat her opponents in this rhythm-combat game taking place in the rave and electronic music world.
